maintainer.name: Gentoo network monitoring and analysis project

pkgmetadata.longdescription: The conntrack-tools are a set of free software userspace tools for Linux that allow system administrators interact with the Connection Tracking System, which is the module that provides stateful packet inspection for iptables. The conntrack-tools are the userspace daemon conntrackd and the command line interface conntrack.

use.flag: Use net-libs/libnetfilter_cthelper for userspace conntrack helper support
Use net-libs/libnetfilter_cttimeout for conntrack timeout support
